main event: A bright, white object that changed color to green and white was spotted in the sky over Newton, Ohio on June 29, 1960.
interesting points: The object had finger-like projections on one side and was larger than stars.
The object disappeared and reappeared, exhibiting unconventional behavior.
The witness estimated the object's speed to be around 15,000 mph.
Ground-based radar and other agencies were unable to identify the object.
The witness was described as sincere and helpful in providing information.
sighted object: bright, white object that changed color to green and white
